elements.title: Dayna Communications (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the release of the MacCharlie (pictured)—an IBM PC that clipped onto the side of the original Macintosh—nearly bankrupted Dayna Communications in 1985?

elements.title: R. K. Padmanabha (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Indian Carnatic music vocalist R. K. Padmanabha teaches group singing predominantly to women?

elements.title: 2022 Liberty Bowl (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a targeting penalty that caused the disqualification of an Arkansas player during overtime of the 2022 Liberty Bowl was overturned by the NCAA the next day?

elements.title: Fernando Cajías (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Fernando Cajías, who belongs to the first generation of professional historians in Bolivia, composed part of history academia's "Mirista wing"?

elements.title: Agua Fria High School (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a mercury spill occurred at Agua Fria High School when students discovered and started playing with an unsecured supply of the element?

elements.title: Cesar Vergara (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that industrial designer Cesar Vergara started designing trains because he "thought most were awful looking"?

elements.title: Three Tuns (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Three Tuns, a 17th-century pub in Alcester, has been left roofless since a 2021 fire?

elements.title: Solihin G. P. (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Solihin G. P. was anecdotally asleep when he was announced as the commander of the Hasanuddin Military Region?
